Text: Why would you need root to play a game?
Needs a rooted device to we can install modified google play store (by celphus) that prevents license verification of final fantasy IV.
oh okay, so it needs the cracked store.
can tyou just get a firewall and block it from accessing your 4g, 3g, or wifi??
The game wont run without verification. The modified play store removes the verification process. Sucks i know.
